attributes.action: Give mike dean the sack! Due to the lack of experience!
attributes.additional_details: Giving players the threats -"if you look at me again, I will send you of the pitch" which was said to a Pedro Obiang, from West Ham united. Absolutely disgraceful! Sky sports, their self, agreeing that he was horrific at his job! Giving out red cards because of the hate for the clubs of his choice!
attributes.background: Mike dean, known as the biggest mistake for referee's in football history, has no experience in football and deserves the sack! He's 100% bias, has no basic knowledge and ruins the sport it's self! Giving players the threats -"if you look at me again, I will send you of the pitch" disgraceful!
